sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { @Input() isMobile: boolean = false; public isChecked:boolean = false constructor() { this.isMobile = false } ngOnInit(): void { } public onClickMenu(): void { this.isChecked = !this.isChecked } }
